text: have you ever started a meeting in the
office and wanted to switch to your
mobile so you can start your commute
home Amazon chime offers seamless
transitions between your devices
transitioning between devices works when
you install Amazon chime on both your
desktop and mobile
devices it is important to know that
when the meet atchim AWS email address
is invited to the meeting all of your
devices ring just answer one device and
the other stop
ringing when you're in a meeting it is
easy to switch devices just locate the
meeting on the device to switch to to
switch from desktop to mobile find and
select your meeting in the meetings Tab
and choose
join you are disconnected from the
meeting on your desktop and connected to
the meeting on your mobile
device to switch from Mobile to desktop
select your meeting in the upper left
under calls and meetings choose
join you are disconnected from the
meeting on your mobile device and
connect it to the meeting on your
desktop when you use Amazon chime on
your mobile device your connection
switches from Wi-Fi to your data network
if your data network is not strong you
can try switching to dial in by choosing
leave meeting then switch to dial
in remember switching devices uses the
same steps to choose audio and connect
to the
meeting and that's it seamless switching
between all your devices
